person.persName: John Chambers Brent (Bourbon County Sheriff/Banker/9th KY)

body.p: Native of Kentucky. Brent worked as a bank teller at the Citizen's Bank of Paris, Kentucky. He eventually took over running the bank from his father. Elected sheriff of Bourbon County in 1864. Active in local Democratic Politics. Major in 9th Kentucky Cavalry from August 1862 to August 1863.
